QuestData.Title: Finding Your Way
QuestData.Description:
Stormwind has a lot to offer adventurers like us, but it's far too big to explore on foot. The captain has arranged for you to receive a mount to help you get around.
She said to speak with Curly at the stables in Old Town... but I can't seem to remember the way there.
Have no worries, $n! All we need to do is ask a guard for directions. If you ever need help finding something, the city guards will show you where to go.
Let's ask a nearby guard for directions to the stable master in Old Town!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Curly at the stables in Old Town.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Curly at the stables in Old Town.
